name: AI Escape (Avocado955)
description:
AI Escape - by Avocado955

AI Escape is a 3D, escape/hide and seek single player game made in Unity.

NOTE: The current WebGL version doesn't seem to scale well in its current settings. I will be fixing this shortly. For now, it works best if you fullscreen it. Apologies if you find this annoying

Credits:

Lowpoly Environment - Nature Pack Free by Polytope Studios: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/lowpoly-environment-nature...

Character models and animations: Mixamo.com

Background Music:  Exhale by Nomyn: https://soundcloud.com/nomyn/exhale

All Animal sounds: Avocado955 

Code and Creation: Avocado955
